hey im having trouble launching the game. As soon as i launch i get an error and am forced to shutdown the program. any suggestions on how i can fix this ? 

Thanks again!

If you run the game and nothing happens this is what you should try to do:

1) If you run it under windows 7, make sure you have Service Pack 1 installed
2) If you don't have Steam installed, than download and install the Steam client
3) Log in or create an account
4) Once logged in, click "Steam" in the upper menu and select "Go Offline". Steam client will restart itself
5) Click "Add a game" in the bottom left corner and select "Add a Non-Steam Game"
6) Select the HMA.exe file for Hitman: Absolution
7) Launch the game from Steam
8) Enjoy

I hope this helps as it worked for me :)

For those who are having issues with DX11 and the game will not play. Change settings to this: Ensure you've turned off MSAA which is under 'display' not 'graphics' as you might expect it to be. Also turn off 'Exclusive Fullscreen'.
